name: odonata
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a group of insects that includes dragonflies and damselflies: Damselflies are a smaller, much more delicate version of true dragonflies, although both are in the same insect order, Odonata. The Dragonfly (Odonata) is a familiar sight around the margins of lakes and rivers.
More examplesFewer examplesWithin eighteen months, the Odonata appeared in Africa, southern Europe and in South America. At this early stage in the Odonata's existence on Earth, people believed that they killed dogs, other animals, and even humans.The backs of the insects were splitting, and new forms emerging from the husks - the adult forms we know as Odonata.
